articles.description: Arsenal's malaise owes a lot to the costs of their new stadium, which was completed 15 years ago. Are Tottenham heading for an even worse fall?
articles.content: This weekend's north London derby is precisely the type of occasion the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium was built for. It is a £1.2 billion ($1.5bn) bricks-and-mortar manifestation of the club's decades-lo… [+9985 chars]
